article_html: Leftwing groups and trade unions are staging rallies to mark International Workers’ Day, also known as Labour Day or May Day. The day commemorates workers’ struggle for better conditions in industrialised countries in the 19th century
authors: Photograph Ye Aung Thu Afp Getty Images
Photograph Mohd Rasfan Afp Getty Images

Photograph Kenzo Tribouillard Afp Getty Images
text: Leftwing groups and trade unions are staging rallies to mark International Workers’ Day, also known as Labour Day or May Day. The day commemorates workers’ struggle for better conditions in industrialised countries in the 19th century
title: Workers rally on May Day around the world – in pictures
